'''"Door"''' is an album-exclusive song composed by [[C418]] that only appears on ''[[Minecraft - Volume Alpha]]''.

== Track description ==
"Door" continues off from where "Key" ends, with light piano melodies that segues into a light remix of "[[Minecraft (song)|Minecraft]]" played on multiple instruments, including a [[flute]]. After the song reaches its peak, a piano plays while a choir plays in the background.

At the end of the song, the piano segues into "[[Subwoofer Lullaby]]".
